mapper.select: select p.pno, m.nick, m.bday, m.sex, m.filepath, p.pno, p.title, p.headcnt, p.ptime, p.pdate, (select truncate(avg(star), 1) from party_review where pno=p.pno) as star, pm.psno, pm.auth from member m join party_members pm on m.mno=pm.mno join party p on pm.pno=p.pno where p.pno = #{value} order by pm.auth desc, m.nick

select m.nick, m.bday, m.sex, m.filepath, p.pno, p.title, p.headcnt, p.ptime, p.pdate, (select truncate(avg(star), 1) from party_review where pno=p.pno) as star, pm.psno, pm.auth from member m join party_members pm on m.mno=pm.mno join party p on pm.pno=p.pno where p.pno = #{value} order by pm.auth desc, m.nick
mapper.insert: insert into party_members( mno, pno, psno, auth) values( #{memberNo}, #{partyNo}, 2, 1)
insert into party_members( mno, pno, psno, auth) values( #{memberNo}, #{partyNo}, 1, 0)
mapper.select: select pm.mno from party_members pm where pm.auth=1 and pm.pno=#{value}

select m.mno, m.filepath, m.nick, m.sex, CASE WHEN age < 20 THEN '10대 이하' WHEN age < 30 THEN '20대' WHEN age < 40 THEN '30대' WHEN age < 50 THEN '40대' WHEN age < 60 THEN '50대' WHEN age > 59 THEN '60대 이상' END AS ageGroup from party_members pm join member m on pm.mno=m.mno join party p on p.pno=pm.pno join (SELECT *, FLOOR(date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(bday,1,4)) age FROM member) ag on ag.mno=m.mno where pm.auth=0 and pm.psno=1 AND p.act=1 and pm.pno=#{partyNo} limit #{pagesStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM party_members pm join member m on pm.mno=m.mno join party p on p.pno=pm.pno WHERE pm.auth = 0 AND p.act=1 and pm.psno=1 AND pm.pno = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM party_members pm join member m on pm.mno=m.mno join party p on p.pno=pm.pno WHERE pm.auth = 0 AND p.act=1 AND pm.mno = #{memberNo} AND pm.pno = #{partyNo}
